definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin

sentences.english: Also showing in numbers now are the fennel shoots and onion sets.
sentences.chinese: 茴香的新芽和洋蔥的植株現在也顯得多了起來。

sentences.english: Growong point becomes blind or stub-like and new shoots may appear from hypocotyls.
sentences.chinese: 生長點不明確，斷株和新芽由胚軸發育而來。

sentences.english: The rosebush is putting out new shoots.
The new buds begin to appear in the spring.
They were putting fresh earth around sprouting potato stalks.
sentences.chinese: 一家人在往綻出新芽的土豆秧周圍培上新土。

sentences.english: After a light spring rain, leaves began to sprout from tress.
sentences.chinese: 一場小小的春雨後，樹木開始冒出新芽。

sentences.english: Rose bushes shoot out again after being cut back.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰叢在修剪之後還能再長出新芽。

sentences.english: Trees send out new shoots in spring.
When cut for firewood, they will sprout new growth from the remaining stump.
sentences.chinese: 若砍樹作柴，則砍後的樹樁還會生出新芽來。

sentences.english: My dear teacher, your love can make the dead tree burst the new bud, make the desert become the oasis.
sentences.chinese: 老師，您的愛能使枯木爆出新芽，使沙漠變成綠洲。

sentences.english: Then pinch the new shoots between your thumb and forefinger.
sentences.chinese: 然後掐掉長度在拇指和食指之間的新芽。

sentences.english: The willow just sprouted little then.
sentences.chinese: 楊柳才吐出半粒米大的新芽。

sentences.english: Love remains or still may come at any given age.
sentences.chinese: 愛情在繼續，甚至還可能在某個年齡綻出新芽。

sentences.english: Can we say that the beginning of medicine plates issued new leaves of the tree?
sentences.chinese: 難道說醫藥板塊開始老樹發新芽了？

sentences.english: There was not a bud anywhere except a few crocuses.
sentences.chinese: 到處都沒有新芽，只有一些藏紅花。

sentences.english: Perhaps to be outdone, jujube scrambling to spit the verdant shoots.
sentences.chinese: 也許是不甘落後，棗樹爭先恐後地吐出了嫩綠的新芽。

definition: variant of 枝椏|枝桠[zhi1 ya1]
(of plants) to turn green again/to revegetate
